1.0.name: wordpress/planaby-shows-and-events-widget
1.0.description:
Planaby offers event promoters the tools to venue-code, and timecode events so they are discoverable by mobile audiences.

"Finally, a way to list upcoming events that is smart enough to even know when they end"

Make your events Mobile-Ready, and easily list upcoming events on any blog post or sidebar using the The Planaby Shows and Events Widget.

Planaby offers anyone the ability to list any number of different widgets in a sidebar or blog post and Planaby will work right from your new post toolbar. Additionally, events can be posted using Planaby for mobile, or Planaby the web at http://ec.planaby.com/ (free signup).

Planaby improves the viral reach of your events, as you encourage other blogs to list your upcoming events in their sidebar as well follow the events you post or have interest in.
